response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. With its exceptional features and capabilities, it's truly a game-changer in its field. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I believe we can come to an agreement that is beneficial for both of us. Considering its worth and the benefits it provides, I propose a price of $9,500 for this product. This price reflects its quality, functionality, and the opportunity it presents for you to achieve your goals more efficiently. I look forward to your response and the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 9500}
